title: Extra Time: Pain and Disappointment
description: The better team on Sunday, the U.S., won’t advance.

title: Elon Musk Says His Cage Fight With Zuckerberg Will Be Streamed on X
description: The two tech billionaires seemingly agreed to a “cage match” face-off in late June.

title: What to Know About the Latest Lawsuit Targeting Student Loan Forgiveness
description: The Administration’s forgiveness efforts are part of the previously announced one-time account adjustment program.

title: ‘Barbie’ Joins $1 Billion Club and Breaks Another Record for Female Directors
description: In modern box office history, just 53 movies have made over $1 billion, not accounting for inflation.

title: Teen Charged With Hate-Motivated Murder in Killing of  O’Shae Sibley
description: Police took the teen into custody Friday in connection with the killing of the 28-year-old O'Shae Sibley, who was gay.

title: The U.S. World Cup Campaign Ends in Historic Disappointment
description: The USWNT is out of the World Cup at the earliest stage in history.

title: Gro Intelligence CEO Sara Menker on the Climate Data That’s Surprising Her
description: TIME spoke with Gro Intelligence CEO Sara Menker about a new Carbon Barometer, and the broader trends they’re seeing in a warming world.
